title: Billionaire’s Sins
description: He’s a man of faith.I am the sin he can’t resist.Father Edward Chase is everything I should avoid.Dark. Brooding. Haunted by a past he refuses to speak of.But when I walk into his church, seeking nothing but a moment of peace, I feel it—the pull.The way his gaze lingers too long.The way his rough voice wraps around my name like a prayer.The way his hands shake when they’re too close to mine.I shouldn’t want him.But I do.And when his control finally snaps, I know there’ll be no saving either of us...
author: L. Steele
